1 [0x0][0x4]: Your chocobo is not carrying a race item.\nOpen a treasure coffer on the course to obtain one.
Summons a quick burst of speed.
Allows a previously used race ability to be executed again.
Sends the forerunning chocobo into a Frenzied state.
Inflicts the forerunning chocobo with Heavy.
Surrounds your chocobo with a ring of thorns which will sap the stamina of any chocobos that enter.
Invigorates your chocobo for 15 seconds, increasing its overall performance while nullifying any enfeeblements.
Summons a meteor from the heavens to wreak havoc on all other chocobos.
